Package Controller

Class LogInUserController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainController
Controller.LogInUserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, ServerCallbacks
public class LogInUserController
extends MainController
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, ServerCallbacks
the controller for the LogInView that allows to perform two actions: go to the register view or login the user.
See Also:
LogInView

  • Constructor Details

    • LogInUserController

      public LogInUserController​(CommunicationServer communicationServer)
      Constructor for the login user controller
      Parameters:
      communicationServer - Allows to establish communication with the server

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Used to perform different actions depending on the event that has occurred. If the user clicked the login button the the system will proceed to login the user. If the user clicked register they will be directed to the registration view page.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - action that has happened

    • logInUser

      public void logInUser​(java.lang.String[] inputs)
      Method used to login the user by verifying the credentials with the server.
      Parameters:
      inputs - String that contains the credentials that the user has inputted. In the first position it has the nickname/email and in the second the password.

    • onUserReceived

      public void onUserReceived()
      Description copied from interface: ServerCallbacks
      this method is called when a user is received by the server
      Specified by:
      onUserReceived in interface ServerCallbacks

      public void onSongReceived​(Song song)

    • onUserSongsReceived

      public void onUserSongsReceived​(java.util.ArrayList<BasicInfoSong> songs)
      Description copied from interface: ServerCallbacks
      this method is called when the user's songs are received
      Specified by:
      onUserSongsReceived in interface ServerCallbacks
      Parameters:
      songs - a list of all the songs made by the currently logged in user
